Title: Trial of the Century
Plot: Alan and Denny co-council two brother accused of murdering their father.  But when Alan predicts a losing verdict, Denny concocts a plan to cast reasonable doubt on their guilt.Meanwhile, Shirley is furious when Jerry and Clarence take the case of a woman suing a casino for losing money.
GuestStars: Ella Pantoliano, Greta Sesheta, Kurt Scholler, Jack Impellizzeri, Christian Clemenson, Leyna Nguyen, Ismail Bashey, Matt DeCaro, Lee Garlington, Josh Zuckerman, Lisa Waltz, Dan Byrd, Amy Aquino, Aisha Tyler, Kevin
